import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" export default function ProductDetails(){ const [product,setProduct]=useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products?'+searchParams) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>setProducts(data.products)) },[]) return product &&
